Sublime introductory lectures

  • Abelson, Introduction to The Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs (1986)
  • Freeman, Introduction to the American Revolution (2010)
  • Hamming, Introduction to the Art of Doing Science and Engineering (1995)
  • Landers, Introduction to Biology (2020)
  • Lo, Introduction to Finance Theory (2008)
  • Sandel, Introduction to Justice (2009)
  • Sapolsky, Introduction to Human Behavioral Biology (2010)
  • Silver, Introduction to Reinforcement Learning (2015)
